description: Baseline scenario with moderate growth and 50-50 allocation

scalar_parameters._k_damage_coeff: Climate damage coefficient: Fracttion of output times delta-T**k_demage_exp
scalar_parameters._k_climate: Temperature sensitivity to cumulative  (K/tCO2) 0.5e-12 ~ 1.8 K per 1000 GtC [noe we are in CO2 units]
scalar_parameters._rho: Pure rate of time preference (1 % per year)
scalar_parameters._deltaL: Fraction of income available for redistribution (5%)

A._growth_rate: TFP consistent with steady state at s = 0.3, alpha = 0.3, delta = 0.1 and L = 10e9; 1% annual TFP growth

theta1._description: Abatement cost per ton of CO2 for the last ton abated ($/tCO2)
theta1._growth_rate: Assume 5% of global GDP to abate all emissions. Declining at 1% per year (technological progress)

integration_parameters._plot_short_horizon: Time horizon (years) for short-term detailed plots. Creates second PDF book with results from t_start to this time.

control_function._description: Allocation policy between abatement and redistribution (also used as initial guess for optimization)
control_function._value: 50% to abatement, 50% to redistribution; this value is used as initial guess for single-point optimization

optimization_parameters._max_evaluations: Maximum number of objective function evaluations
optimization_parameters._control_times: Times (years) where control points are placed. Single point [0] for constant optimization, multiple points for time-varying. Currently spaced at 5% each for PRTP =1%.
optimization_parameters._initial_guess: Initial f values at each control time. Must have same length as control_times. Each value in [0,1]
optimization_parameters._algorithm_note: Optional: specify NLopt algorithm. Omit to use default (LN_BOBYQA). Note: NLopt algorithms are single-threaded.
optimization_parameters._algorithm: Options: LN_BOBYQA (local, smooth), GN_ISRES (global, stochastic, good for multi-modal), GN_DIRECT_L (global, deterministic), LN_COBYLA (local), LN_NELDERMEAD (local simplex)
optimization_parameters._stopping_criteria: Optional NLopt stopping criteria (omit to use NLopt defaults). All default to 0.0 (disabled) if not specified.
optimization_parameters._ftol_rel: Relative tolerance on objective function: stops when |Δf| < ftol_rel * |f|
optimization_parameters._ftol_abs: Absolute tolerance on objective function: stops when |Δf| < ftol_abs
optimization_parameters._xtol_rel: Relative tolerance on parameters: stops when |Δx| < xtol_rel * |x| for all parameters
optimization_parameters._xtol_abs: Absolute tolerance on parameters: stops when |Δx| < xtol_abs for all parameters
